basics.label: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
basics.summary: A Bachelor of Science in Information Technology graduate with major in Network Technology. Experienced hands-on in Web Development, IoT Systems, and Creative Design. Built multiple projects using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Firebase, and Arduino. Familiar with system administration and basic AWS cloud services. Eager to join a dynamic team to grow and I can apply these skills in a collaborative environment.
